title: Rim Trail
text: The Rim Trail is a <a href="hiking">hiking</a> <a href="trail">trail</a> located on the South Rim of the <a href="Grand%20Canyon%20National%20Park">Grand Canyon National Park</a>, located in the <a href="U.S.%20state">U.S. state</a> of <a href="Arizona">Arizona</a>. It is a trail between the <a href="South%20Kaibab%20Trail">South Kaibab Trail</a>head west to <a href="Hermit%27s%20Rest">Hermit's Rest</a>.
